Avalon Utilities

Packages
org.apache.avalon.util.defaults Provides support for the aggregation of a set of property values into a single property set.
org.apache.avalon.util.env Contains a specialized properties object that handles establishment of operationg system specific environment variables as property values.
org.apache.avalon.util.exception Contains an exception helper static utility class that provides support for the creation of exception reposrt derived from cascading exception.
org.apache.avalon.util.factory The factory api package defines a generic factory interface.
org.apache.avalon.util.factory.impl The factory impl package provides a parameterized map implementation that can be used to simplfy the creation and management of factory criteria.
